subscribeWithVargsLast.summary: Subscribe to a record set.  Returns a handle that provides `stop()` and `ready()` methods.

params.description: Name of the subscription. Matches the name of the server's publish() call.
params.name: name

params.description: Optional arguments passed to publisher function on server.
params.name: arg1, arg2...

subscribe.summary: Subscribe to a record set.  Returns a handle that provides `stop()` and `ready()` methods.

params.description: Name of the subscription. Matches the name of the server's publish() call.
params.name: name

params.description: Optional arguments passed to publisher function on server.
params.name: arg1, arg2...

params.description: Optional. May include onError and onReady callbacks. If a function is passed instead of an object, it is interpreted as an onReady callback.
params.name: callbacks
